dcterms:creator: F. Zhu
dcterms:description: The Samson dataset comprises 156 bands, recording wavelengths between 401 − 889 nm. The original image is cropped into three regions of interest, focusing on ROI Samson #1, characterized by three endmembers: Soil, Tree, and Water.
dcterms:title: Samson

dcterms:creator: B. Rasti
B. Koirala
P. Scheunders
P. Ghamisi
dcterms:description: The Jasper Ridge dataset comprises 224 bands with a spectral resolution of 9.46 nm, recorded within the wavelength range of 380 − 2500 nm. It includes four endmembers: Road, Soil, Water, and Tree.
dcterms:title: Jasper Ridge

dcterms:creator: Y. Yu
Y. Ma
X. Mei
F. Fan
J. Huang
H. Li
dcterms:description: The Urban dataset consists of 210 bands, with 162 bands remaining after the removal of channels affected by dense water vapor and atmospheric effects. It includes five endmembers: Grass, Asphalt, Roof, Tree, and Soil.
dcterms:title: Urban
